describe: The sum of IRR, IND, URB, and RUR
Annual quantity of water withdrawn for irrigation including the losses during conveyance and field application, but it does not include water for pasture or aquaculture
Area equipped for irrigation by crop
The water used per unit of irrigated area by crop
Annual quantity of water withdrawn for industrial purposes, including self-supplied industries and the industries that are connected to the public supply network
Industrial GVA by industries
WU per unit of GVA for all industries
The sum of water withdrawn for direct uses by urban residents and service activities
Annual quantity of water withdrawn by the public supply network for the direct uses by urban residents
The number of urban residents, including urban residents registered with urban residential permit (‘hukou’) and rural residents who migrate to urban regions no matter what they get urban hukou or not
Urban domestic WU per capita of urban population
Annual quantity of water withdrawn by the public supply network for the direct uses by service activities
GVA of service activities
WU per unit of GVA of service activities
Annual quantity of water withdrawn by the public supply network for the direct uses by rural residents and livestock
Annual quantity of water withdrawn by the public supply network for the direct uses by rural residents
Population living in rural regions
Rural domestic WU per capita of rural population
Annual quantity of water withdrawn by the public supply network for livestock drinking and cleaning
Livestock commodity calories summed from 7 types of animal
WU per unit of livestock commodity calories
